login.login_to_account: Login to your El Eden Group Account

error500.title: Error 500
error500.subtitle: Internal server error.
error500.description: Sorry, something has gone wrong with our servers. Our technical team has been notified and is working to resolve the problem.
error500.description2: If the problem persists, please contact our support team.

error404.title: Error 404
error404.subtitle: Page not found.
error404.description: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved. Check the URL or navigate from the main menu.
error404.description2: Need help? Contact our support team

error403.title: Error 403
error403.subtitle: Access denied.
error403.description: You do not have permission to access this page. If you believe this is an error, please contact your administrator.
error403.description2: If you need access, please contact the system administrator.

error401.title: Error 401
error401.subtitle: Unauthorized.
error401.description: You need to log in to access this page. Your session may have expired.
error401.description2: If you need help, please contact our support team.
